channel.title: [508] Client IP changer [508]
channel.description:
Hey guys i need some help with my 508 , i have been looking throw some tuts and its really helped but now im having trouble 508-client side , i whould like to add a client to my server without the "ip changing" so people wont have to use this feature.. is there a client like this? and if there is how whould i change the ip.. and if there is any way to change it from a ip-changing client to a set ip.
many thanks lewis`

item.title: [508] Client IP changer [508]
item.dc:creator: @runeboy66 runeboy66
item.description:
@runeboy66 wrote:

get any 508 ip changer and then find client.java search for IPHERE and then change it to your ip then save it and compile if that doesent work download any servers client that has a compiler inside and then go to the client and search for the servers ip eg examplescape1278736876328.no-ip.biz this is not a real server im just using as an example incase i get banned, anyhow if it does work i didnt know that its a server, Then change that to your ip, save and compile. =) hope i helped

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Client IP changer [508]
item.dc:creator: @AeroScape AeroScape
item.description:
@AeroScape wrote:

Well, honestly, I know no 508 IP changer that you can set your own IP. So that when you open the client it automatically goes to your server. sorry, I’m a 317 guy, not a 508 guy. I recommend making your own.

Read full topic
